title: Hardik threat to ODI
text:
Hardik threat to ODI Hardik threat to ODI October 17,2015, Ahmedabad, DHNS 
The Patel quota stir leader Hardik Patel has threatened to stage a gherao at the cricket stadium on Sunday in Rajkot, where the third one-day international match between India and South Africa will be played. “The Saurashtra Cricket Association has played mischief and distributed all the tickets to Bharatiya Janata Party workers. If we are not issued tickets we would create roadblocks on the way to the stadium and not allow teams to travel from their hotel to stadium,” Patel said in a video message released on social media.Patels have been agitating for last three months seeking OBC status and reservations in government jobs and educational institutions. The Patels had threatened that they would buy tickets for the match in bulk and use the platform to highlight their issue on international stage as matches are generally telecast internationally.
